messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I've been shot. Please get an officer to 6701 Northwest 7th Avenue.
Okay, I've got the address. Which police department do you belong to?
Miami Police.
Alright, stay with me on the line. Where's the person that shot you?
They fled.
He fled?
Yes.
What is your name?
I'm Joseph.
What's your last name?
Joseph is my last name.
What's your unit number?
33, 43. I'm a headquarters unit. Please stay with me on the line.
Are you in front of the address?
No, I'm in the back of the church.
Okay, I'm sending help your way. Are you sure the person that shot you is gone?
Yes, they're gone. Three black males.
Do you remember if they fled on foot or in a car?
They fled on foot. About 5'7, light complexion, wearing black and red.
Alright, I have help on the way. Just hang in there.
Thank you.
Fire Rescue, this is County. I need fire rescue to respond to one of our off-duty officers that's been shot at 6701 Northwest 7 Avenue. He is behind the church.
What's the phone number you're calling from?
And you're sure the offender has left the area?
Yes, they fled on foot.
Alright, we'll send them right out. Thank you.
Thank you.
